inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of relapsed or refractory glioblastoma multiforme (GBM), anaplastic astrocytoma
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients previously treated with more than 6 cycles (28 days each) of Bevacizumab at 10/mg/kg.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention
